brand_color_description: Brand color for major navigational elements
brand_text_color_description: Button color for hover and active states
text_color_description: Text color for body and heading elements
background_color_description: Background color of your Help Center
favicon_description: Icon displayed in the address bar of your browser
homepage_background_image_description: Hero image on the home page
community_background_image_description: Hero image on the community topics page
community_image_description: Image for the community section on the home page
scoped_knowledge_base_search_description: Search results are confined to the category the user is in
scoped_community_search_description: Search results are confined to the topic the user is in
recent_activity_description: Show recent activity on home page
articles_in_section_description: Show sidebar of articles in section
follow_article_description: Users can follow a specific article
article_sharing_description: Show social media sharing on article
follow_section_description: Users can follow a specific section
follow_post_description: Users can follow a specific post
post_sharing_description: Show social media sharing on post
follow_topic_description: Users can follow a specific topic
search_placeholder_description: Placeholder text for the search field
categories_bg_color_description: Background color of the category icon
facebook_url_description: URL to Facebook account. To hide this fill - (only dash) in text box.
twitter_url_description: URL to Twitter account. To hide this fill - (only dash) in text box.
github_url_description: URL to GitHub account. To hide this fill - (only dash) in text box.
linkedin_url_description: URL to LinkedIn account. To hide this fill - (only dash) in text box.
pinterest_url_description: URL to Pinterest account. To hide this fill - (only dash) in text box.
instagram_url_description: URL to Instagram account. To hide this fill - (only dash) in text box.
youtube_url_description: URL to YouTube account. To hide this fill - (only dash) in text box.
custom_menu_description: Text before the hamburger. To hide the hamburger icon fill - (only dash) in text box.
dropdown1_description: To hide this fill - (only dash) in text box
footer_text_color_description: Color of the footer text and links
menu_color_description: Color of the header links and text
request_list_beta_description: Users can sort and filter requests, add and remove columns
logo_tagline_description: The tagline to display after the logo
alert_bar_description: Show alert bar on top (all pages)
alert_bar_bg_description: Background color of the alert bar
alert_text_color_description: Text color of the alert bar
alert_text_description: The text of the alert bar
alert_link_text_description: Link text of the alert bar
alert_link_url_description: URL of the alert bar link
border_radius_description: Roundness for search bar and buttons
submit_bg_color_description: Background color of the search submit button
support_message_description: Show block for create ticket users
support_message_text_description: The text of the message block
bg_color_description: Sidebar articles, ticket form and breadcrumb area
icon_with_title_description: Show the icon in Promoted Section heading
translations_enable_description: Use dynamic content placeholder instead of static text (https://6ton.short.gy/lang)
enable_link_description: Use the custom link on your logo
enable_link_url_description: Add the custom link to your logo
enable_signin_description: Show sign in button for Anonymous users
enable_ticket_description: Show submit ticket button on the header
enable_community_description: Show community button on the header
visited_link_color_description: Text color for visited link elements
